PerformanceScriptTimingWindowAttribution.summary: The windowAttribution read-only property of the interface returns an enumerated value describing the relationship of the container (i.e., either the top-level document or an {{htmlelement("iframe")}}) in which the long animation frame (LoAF)-causing script was executed, relative to the window running the current document.
PerformanceScriptTimingWindowAttribution.value: An enumerated value, which can be one of:
